channel.title: university on Mathurin Choblet
channel.description: Recent content in university on Mathurin Choblet

item.title: University
item.description: A collection of presentations and reports I did throughout my studies. Master thesis (2022) My thesis is about applying methods from Data Assimilation to climate model data and terrestial proxies (speleothemes and icecores) (I will for sure do a blog post at one point) Outline presentation of the project Update presentation (focus on computational efficiency of different type of Ensemble Kalman Filters) Paper discussion in our climate variability Journal club.

item.title: Get started in Heidelberg
item.description: Information for new students in Heidelberg Hello visitor, whereever you come from! If you’re a new student arriving in Heidelberg from abroad this is the blog you were looking for. I helped some new students in Heidelberg during the last years and wanted to gather the most imporant information once and for all at one place. My focus lies on sharing personal experiences and letting you save money whenever possible.
